logline: A light-hearted kitchen battle ensues as three friends experiment with outrageous smoothie ingredients, leading to unexpected hilarity.

background.description: A bright, colorful kitchen filled with fresh fruits and a blender.

characters.name: JAKE
characters.description: Mid-20s, laid-back, always wearing a goofy hat, loves trying new things.

characters.name: SARAH
characters.description: Early 30s, health-conscious, sarcastic, always prepared with a witty comeback.

characters.name: MIKE
characters.description: Late 20s, overly enthusiastic, the 'smoothie expert,' a bit clueless.

beats.description: JAKE stands by the blender, holding a banana with a mischievous grin.
SARAH rolls her eyes at JAKE's gummy bear idea.
MIKE bounces in, excited about adding chocolate syrup.
JAKE suggests calling it a 'dessert smoothie.'
SARAH smirks, calling it a 'regret smoothie.'
JAKE presses the blender button, causing a smoothie explosion.
All three burst into laughter at the mess.
